DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare mammography adherence among woman receive tailor , interactive mammography intervention via DVD telephone counsel usual care .
DOC.brief_title: Breast Cancer Screening Via Computer V. Phone
DOC.detailed_description: Efficacy Study - We use stratified block randomization base race ensure treatment group maintain comparable race composition . Participants randomly assign one intervention group usual care . Intervention Group 1 receive , mail , DVD version interactive computer program ; base response query , program supply immediate feedback promote mammography . Intervention Group 2 receive telephone version tailor intervention deliver counselor station computer . The counselor use question interactive program deliver message program generates response woman 's answer . A third group receive usual care . All woman ask participate 6-month 21-month follow-up telephone interview query stage mammography adherence belief .
DOC.criteria: • Must member HMO/insurance plan least 15 month record indicate mammogram ( screen diagnostic ) 15month period Current member plan time study enrollment No history breast cancer diagnosis Complete telephone number mail address • Any claim submit mammogram ( screen diagnostic ) last 15 month within HMO/insurance plan outside source Previous breast cancer diagnosis Incomplete telephone number mailing address
